entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Mont Saint-Hilaire
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM EDT Friday 29 April 2016
